title: Citadel of the Stars (5C32)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	-2

Game Text:	Fortification. Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Exert a [Gondor] Man or spot 3 knights to transfer this condition from your support area to a minion skirmishing a [Gondor] Man.
Lore:	The city of Osgiliath was the first capital of Gondor.
Rarity:	C
